name: Thigh Support
descr:
The Chiroform Thigh Support helps relieve pain. For acute pain and for prevention of thigh problems. The Chiroform Thigh Support specifically protects and supports hamstring injuries and quadripceps strain. It is easy to put on and maintains its shape. Overuse and excessive stretching may result in pain. Suitable for all-day and long-term use. Wash by hand. Can be used for right and left elbow. Excellent fit due to patented knitted design. Highly elastic wave knit. Mild compression of approx. 20-25 mmHg.
